effect.black_white: Inflicts regular damage. User’s critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move.
effect.black_2_white_2: Inflicts regular damage. User’s critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move.

short_effect.black_white: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.

flavor_text.black_white: The user handles a sharp leaf like a sword and attacks by cutting its target. Critical hits land more easily.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user handles a sharp leaf like a sword and attacks by cutting its target. Critical hits land more easily.
